name: Project 9414
description:
A small sandbox god game made with Löve (https://love2d.org/) for the LD38.

Produce mana, oxygen and food to expand, terraform and survive.

Beware antimatter and black holes.

I let you discover the "rules" (quite explained in-game when hovering stuffs).

If you need any explanation or advise, feel free to ask in comment. ;)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/project-9414/

Art: twitter.com/ultrasqull

Code: twitter.com/dustbowlags

Music: twitter.com/pederjohnsen
